twoSetSkill.name: Sprit of Light and Shadow 2 Pieces
twoSetSkill.description:
When dealing Bleed DMG to an enemy, the host gains 1 count. When the count reaches 10, deals 500.0% ATK of Physical DMG to the last target and clear the count. The DMG counts as Bleeding DMG (The count trigger interval: 0.3s, DMG CD: 5s).
Griseo equip bonus: If the bot piece of this set is equiped, unleashing Ult also inflicts [Structure Sketch] and other team merbers gain the same buff. When [Structure Sketch] ends, increases Total DMG taken by the enemies by 36% for 12s and put the [Structure Sketch] state into 20s CD. Trigger interval: 20s.

threeSetSkill.name: Brilliantly Colorful World 3 Pieces
threeSetSkill.description: Increases ATK Speed by 35.0%. After activating Ult, increases Total DMG of attacks of all team members, against enemies with a broken shield or no shield, by 2.0% for each Bleeding stack, max at 10.0%, for 20s. (Cannot be stacked, can be refreshed)
